text: Offer letter kab milega bhai !! Abto B.Tech bhi khatam !!
author: Kunal  Sharma

text:
Akhilesh bhai  Tareef karu kya uski jisne tujhe banaya....

ok ok.. bollywood kachra asides, I remember pehli baar apan sip k resume verification k time mile the aur tu meri physics olympiad ki rank dekhke seduce hogya tha üôÉ( itni kharaab bhi nhi thi vese , xd), uske baad psy ka project, fir summer aa gyi aur apan ho gye bhand ( bonding acchi ho gyi). Cycle exchange, movies, late night walks, all happened. 

Itne time ki dosti m I realised one thing and seriously this time, itna  humble, padhai ko leke sincere, caring aur selfless banda , all at the same time, mene life mein nhi dekha. Senti na krne ki poori koshish kri h, but fact to batana hi padegana bro. Thanks for all the help and everything. Trip plan krne ka mtlb nhi, suddenly jb bhi banega, nikal lenge.
author: Kunal  Sharma

text:
Pandey Ji.... sab badhiya ?... kya mast aadmi ho yr , har cheej ekdum properly manage krke chalte ho acads, gym, POR, coding har cheej mein ekdum perfect balance, kaha se aata h itna discipline bro, koi bhi advice leni ho to inse lo.. har cheej ka gyan h inko. Bhaut kuch seekha tumse second year mein, itne badhiya aadmi jo ho...kbhi mauka milega to milenge zarur...miss u too bro.!!
Peace !!
author: Kunal  Sharma

text:
Yo Monu !
Vese to apan TA201 k project m first time mile the but asli timespaas psy group se shuru hua. Tumhare aur Akhilesh k sath mein bhi MSO210 ki subah 8 abje wali class attend krleta tha, wrna usme to kaun hi aata tha üòÇ. Uske baad summer mein to jese 3G walo ko 4G mil gya ho, RM ki late night walk, movies, hc k saamne wale pedh k neeche bulla, hall k bahar juice aur jaate jaate kbhi kbhi hall k bahar cycle p baatein. Remember ekdin apan chaaro badminton khele the, butwo to  first and last time banke hi reh gya apna, xd.  
Kaafi help kri tumne (especially Vipul k course mein ü§£) and bahut kuch seekhne ko mila tumse bas yoga reh gya, lets C kya pata Mayurasana se Pincha mayurasana bhi seekh jau üòÜ. Itna kuch hua but phtos nhi liye, ekdin campus aake wo bhi ho jaega.
Yoga hamehsa krte rehna ,53 mat bhoolna üòõ aur Microsoft mein recommendation krwa dena mera bhi üòÇ.
NAINITAL is the future !!
author: Kunal  Sharma

text:
Yo Geetam bhai, poori batti ka sabse unique banda, naam se leke placement tk, sab unique hi tera.
Apple mein khata rehta tha aur chala tu gya usme, xd. Yaad h ekbaar 380 ki lab k baad toilet jaake alag level hase the apan us bande k jaane k baad, class pahuchte time tak hasi nhi rukri thi.
FIrst year mein tere room p bulla, cc jaake mth101 padhna aur 5th sem mein sath mein lab mein fraud maarne k tareeko se kaafi kuch seekhne ko mila tujhse. Har jagah chaap deta tha badi easily tu. Logo ki gand bhi utni hi easily maar leta h tu üòÜ. 
Bas jaate jaate mil nhi paye, kbhi mauka milega to zarur milenge, badi treat deni h tujhe, tere epic comments yaad rahenge wing walo ko !
Peace !
author: Kunal  Sharma

text:
Heylo Jay, Kota se jante hum ekdsoosre ko, same coaching, same clg, same branch, aur ab same company, kya pta team bhi same nikle :). One of those rare peaople jo tbse leke abtk consistently har jagah chaap  rhe h, keep it up man!  Bas hall alag the apne :(, same hall hote to shyd aur acchi hoti dosti apni !! 
Milte h Gurgaon mein , Peace !!
author: Kunal  Sharma

text: Hello Jaydeep, 2nd year tk bas logo se hi suna tha tum kitne chaapu ho but 380 k lab partner banne k baad pta bhi chal gya. Kevlin k room p kaafi jldi sare experments revise krliye the humne. Above all this, power lab ka tumahara wo dhamaka to yaad rahega , xd !!!
author: Kunal  Sharma

text:
Kuldeep- The mast aadmi, nighout maarna seekh gya tere sath. First year summer mein bahut maje maare aapan ne, although mein ghar chala gya tha but MAV to tune akele hi uda diya tha successfully, chaap deta h tu yr esi kahi bhi. Yaad h Neeraj wale joke p kya pel k hase the apan aero k time, club se fraud maarke OAT mein movie dekhne chale jaate the.
Final year mein campus aata mein to bulla kaat te but anyways, bhool mat jana hume corporate life mein ghuske.
Apna pushup challenge bacha h ! 
Peace !
author: Kunal  Sharma

text:
Yo KG... first year se bhai h apan. Wing mein sabse zyada bulla mene agar kisi k sath kaata h to wo to hi h. Jab bhi life boring si lge to room se bahar nikalo aur KG mil jaega, koi esi mast si baat batega ye aur thodi hi der mein  mood badhiya ho jaega. Bahar se kitni bhi gaaliya kyu na dede but dil ka bahut acha banda h tu, kaafi baar endtime p bas tu hi kaam ata tha !! Confidence level ho to KG jesa ho, us din seminar mein ring wali baat mein us bande ki kya gand maarli tune, wo baat hamesha yaad rahegi üòÇ.
Bhai badal to tu kaafi gya h chaar saal mein, pehle tu dabta tha kuch logo se aur ab tu jo chahe uski  gaand maar leta h, kisiki himmat nhi ki teri gand marle, dassa bhi maarne lag gya h, ese hi machate ja life mein, bahut aage pahuch jaega bhai. 
All the best future k liye !!
Peace !
author: Kunal  Sharma

text: Kya mast aadmi h yr tu, always ready to help, known you from A1, physics ki quiz mein tera hi naam  dikhta tha hamesha sabse upar. First year mein fb p itna spam machaya tune ki sab tujhe virtually to janne hi lag gye the, xd. Bhool mat jana hume.. till next time...take care..peace!!
author: Kunal  Sharma

text: Ideal roommate, nice guy,  sober guy, chaapte rho !!
author: Kunal  Sharma

text:
I don't remember when I met you first time. ok so without stretching it long and getting into a clich√© memoir format, let me come directly to the point summing everything in one line,
Heavy Treat pending, xd!!
author: Kunal  Sharma

text: Yaad aaya.. first time interaction apna......TA202 k group mein aane k liye tumne msg kiya tha.....yaad nhi sorry kisine yaad dilaya....wo bas tumhe hi pta h kisne yaad dilaya....XD !!
author: Kunal  Sharma

text:
Hi Pooja !!
Probably the first girl I talked to in campus, lol.  Aero club mein mile the hum first time, tbto kaafi sandpaper ghisa humne sath mein, itna ki mujhe to sapne mein bhi sandpaper hi aagya tha ekbarüòÜ ( if you remember wo sand wala joke). Ekdin jb safai krwa rhe the club mein to mene tumhe gate p hi convince krdiya tha aur hum seedha cycle p fraud maarne nikal gye the campus mein. Uske baad to suddenly Lucknow trip ka plan bana aur humne ekaur din ka fraud maarliya, but this fraud was amazing, few of the best memories of four years I have ‚ù§Ô∏è.
Uske baad to hum bas tutorial aur labs mein milte the, class to tum bas sem k starting mein aati thi üòõ. Octave wala din to yaad rahega, tumahri cycle n dhokha kr tha.
Kaafi shant aur hasmukh ho yr tum, ese hi rehna! Party bhi milegi :) tbtk k liye all the best for your exam, jamke prepare krna aur chaap dena !!
author: Kunal  Sharma

text: Got to know this prodigy and a humble being in the first year summer. Shared with you the experience of the only successful trip during these four years of IITK (baaki sab to dhari reh gyi), what an awesome experience it was. The thought of that palatable food at your home still salivates me. Had we been in campus right now, surely would have spent some more time with you. Hope we meet someday in future.
author: Kunal  Sharma

text:
Yes yes, I remember jab Shreyansh k ghar bethe the hum 2 exams k beech mein and also jab tum dono Singhania aaye the for some shitty science quiz. Ukse baad hall3 mess k saamne mile clg k pehle din and I was like, chalo koi to mila kota wala üòÇ.  Kya multitalented banda h yr tu, har kaam mein aage, fir wo chahe acads ho ya POR ya kuch bhi random cheez ,hamesha chill rehta h....be the same in future too man. Hope you achieve great heights....Till next time.
Peace!!
author: Kunal  Sharma

text:
Shashank, but famous as Shailabh and infamous for flattering cse profs, itni mehnat, itni ML, itni intern, inte research paper publish, itna jugaad, itni POR, inti multitasking, itna RRüòÜ, itna sab kuch kese krlete ho bhai. Bahut kuch seekhne ko mila tujhse which I am not gonna tell here üòõ. 
Abto adobe jaake bandi bhi bana lega bhai, firto koi esa kaam nhi bachega jo tumne na kiya ho. Bhool mat jana hum logo ko Adobe pahuchke, milna bacha h apna, last year hath se chala gya vese hi. Miltein h kbhi bhai !
Last mein ye line to banti h
"Shailabh Bihari sab p bhari"
author: Kunal  Sharma

text: HeYlo old friend, hope you remember we met for first time in class 9 in some shitty workshop, sahi kaha tha Shailesh n, macha k rakh deta h Snehal, kher abto wo Netflix star ban chuka h. One of the most sincere students of A1. I regret we didn't have much interaction in iitk, but knowing you since a long time, I can definitely say you are such a humble and hardworking person, your strong work ethics have taken you from what you were then to what are today..till next time..peace!!
author: Kunal  Sharma

text: Hi Sparsh Cowshik from bambala cantt, a character that hides himself behind an ever smiling face and is always ready to go on a walk to OAT.  2nd year k baad wali summer k to kya kehna, kuch cheeje jo yha nhi likhi ja skti jinka zikr dm mein hua tha :) aur baaki rm ki bkchodiya, yhi baatein to baad mein yaad aaengi (Abhishek Upmanyu).  Colllege k baad bhi itna hi khush rahiyo bhai jitna abhi rehta h, baaki baatein jb milenge tb krte h, jagah kam pad jaegi yha to.
author: Kunal  Sharma

text:
Hello Roomie and the Lord of the Wing ( especially batti walo ka), thanks for being a great companion right from the first year, helping me in my bad times and for bearing a roommate like me. 

Kitna bhi pubgji khela ho, kitna bhi soya ho, kitni hi series kyuna dekhi ho lekin ek raat pehle padhke chaapne ka business is completely your business, none of our business bhai. seekhne ki koshish kri but tere jitna chaapna to impossible rha.

Edm night mein bhand hoke nachne se leke room p sasti baaton ka nasha krna, cc se leke library tk ki magai, everywhere we have been there together.  Milte h jldi !!
author: Kunal  Sharma
